text: I'll Do Anything is a comedy-drama movie from 1994. This movie is about an actor who finds himself the sole caretaker for his six-year-old daughter. Anne Heche plays Claire. Tracey Ullman plays Beth. Nick Nolte plays Matt. The movie got very positive reviews from the critics. The box office intake, however, was poor. The release of I'll Do Anything was in February 1994. Category:1994 comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies composed by Hans Zimmer
title: I'll Do Anything
